item.title: Handcannon 317 help

item.description:

Any sugestions or anyone with the same problem?

Here are my inits

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 48465; class8.anInt181 = 1000; class8.anInt169 = -5; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt190 = 321; class8.anInt198 = 24; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 48512;//anInt165 class8.anInt200 = 48512;//anInt200 class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Hand Cannon";
